ygData.subject: UNSUBSCRIBE
ygData.msgSnippet: ... === -Billy Alanbar __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Bid and sell for free at http://auctions.yahoo.com
ygData.messageBody:
--- Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...> wrote:
> From: Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...>
>
> At 05:28 PM 9/17/1999 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
> >
> >and if a friend offered me serpentine bracers and
> an exe hood i wouldn't
> >take em. I don't need em at my level and when I
> get to the appropriate
> >level i want to go camp for them....it's how the
> game was meant to be
>
> Oh that's a good line. "I want to go camp for
> them''. and how do you justify
> that in roleplaying terms. I know for me, the less
> camping i do the more
> fun the game is for me.
>
> >played and until they change the whole camping
> system I will continue to
> >play it in that fashion. Twinkers like you already
> screwed the
> >PoF.....whats next....Lower Guk...permafrost.....
>
> I don't believe that the plane of fear was closed
> due to twinking. you
> have no
> proof of this, you are just making what happened fit
> your conclusions. I did
> see a post earlier on the list regarding a reason
> that was attributed to
> someone
> from Verant which i would tend to believe much more.
>
> >
> >you're just a bunch of jerks who don't give a shit
> about the rest of the
> >people that play the game....so I can't wait until
> you get to 50th level
>
> Ah, why do these discussions always turn into
> namecalling and swearing?
> Why can't anyone have a rational discussion about
> these game issues without
> saying i am right, you are wrong, and if you don't
> agree with me you are a
> *^$&^%&(%$%#%*&%$. I don't expect a response to
> this question since
> you have already dropped down to this level of
> discussion, of course.
>
> >and leave the game cause you have nothing else to
> do. maybe you can then
> >go back to UO or whatever jerkoff game you played
> before you came and
> >wrecked this one.
>
> To me, I enjoy exploring new areas of the world that
> I haven't seen before.
> If I am
> level 50 and have all kinds of cool stuff, that
> won't stop that
> exploration. Heck
> maybe i will create a new <fill in class here> and
> twink the heck out of
> him/her,
> bwahahahahaha. For some of us the items are just a
> tool to be able to do
> other
> things. Obviously to you, the items are the end all
> be all of the game.
> Seems more
> like a power gamer's viewpoint rather than a role
> player's viewpoint to me.
>
> Caloron
> Veeshan
> (if anyone cares, heh)
>
> >
> >Sligo
> >Cazic Thule
> >
